title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Woke Media, NFL Happenings
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Woke Media, NFL Happenings
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--opines on the "woke sports media" commentary surrounding the Brooklyn Nets' hiring of pro basektball Hall of Fame point guard Steve Nash over Brooklyn assistant Jacque Vaughn. Also, John Middlekauff--former NFL scout and host of the "3 And Out" podcast--stops in The Herd to talk about all the NFL happenings before the 2020 season begins.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
